Sentencas: An anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based on 8 mol % yttria-stabilized zirconia (8YSZ) electrolyte that was deposited via an electron-beam physical vapor deposition (EB-PVD) technique, was investigated.
Titulo: Characterization of thin-film YSZ deposited via EB-PVD technique in anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: A NiO-8YSZ plate was used as both an anode substrate and as a substrate for the deposition of 8YSZ.
Titulo: Characterization of thin-film YSZ deposited via EB-PVD technique in anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: An additional buffering layer was coated on the anode substrate via a screen printing before the deposition of YSZ film in order to enhance the surface smoothness for the film deposition.
Titulo: Characterization of thin-film YSZ deposited via EB-PVD technique in anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: In this study, we controlled various experimental variables for the film deposition and subsequent heat treatment process to obtain highly dense and impervious electrolyte film.
Titulo: Characterization of thin-film YSZ deposited via EB-PVD technique in anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: Consequently, we were able to obtain a large area (12 x 12 cm) and dense YSZ film with a uniform thickness of similar to 8 mu m. The surface and cross-sectional microstructure and the corresponding phase of deposited film were thoroughly analyzed by scanning electron microscopy and X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Characterization of thin-film YSZ deposited via EB-PVD technique in anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of the EB-PVD unit cell was investigated using dc current-voltage load testing, a dc current interruption technique, and an ac-impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Characterization of thin-film YSZ deposited via EB-PVD technique in anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: Peculiar microstructural features of the deposited film, such as the columnar structure of grains along the growing axis, and the film's microstructural effect on unit cell performance, were addressed.
Titulo: Characterization of thin-film YSZ deposited via EB-PVD technique in anode-supported SOFCs
